Articles.Content: I see a hole ton of posts, that say Jeb, and all those who smile during flight, are insane. I don\'t think this is true. I used to think that he was the only trained astronaut of the group, and Bob and Bill are just rich, and not ready for it. I know his job is serious, but if you watch videos of todays astronauts, they actually have a lot of fun during the mission.

Uhhhhhhhhh........... well, if you didn\'t get the memo, in human terms hes Evel Knieval, Elvis Presley, and Neil Armstrong perfected and rolled into one. Plus if you ever got the earlier versions, there were only Bill, Jeb, and Bob. Bill was the 'smartypants' Jeb the 'thrillmaster' and Bobs always ******* his pants.
Most kerbals seem to be brave or dumb. In the case of jeb, I think he is full of both!
On a scale of 1-10 of badassery, Jeb was a 27 minimum.

Hes BadS.

And just in case you don\'t get this in-joke:

In the file that selects crews, there are values assigned to each member for how easily they shit themselves. One category is called 'badS', short for 'Badass', and of the original crew only jeb (who has yet to seriously frown) has this set to 1.

In short, badass.

'Trained?'

'Trained, you said?'

http://youtu.be/r4RGqhrZA7E

Kerbals are not trained. They get on the rocket straight off the street.

No, Jeb is not crazy, he is THE Kerbal version of Duke Nukem, the kerbal with balls of steel(if kerbal gets a pair of them) and is just too good for the job that he find it boring from time to time, thats why he always looking for thrills to a point where even most fatal explosion does not make him crack.
